title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8115.20 - Town of North Hudson
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8115.20 - Town of North Hudson

State Regulations
(a) US Route 9. The northbound and southbound roadways of US Route 9 between CR 2B (Blue Ridge

Road) and I-87 exit 30 southbound entrance and exit ramps. (b) Blue Ridge Road. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of Blue Ridge Road (SH 8535) between US Route 9 and I-87
exit 29 southbound entrance and exit ramps. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8115.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
